name: Scrambled Sewer
description:
This game was made for the https://itch.io/jam/benbonk-game-jam-2

Summary: 

You are in a flooded sewer, and you need to get out before you drown

How to play: 

Jump : W, Up Arrow, or Space

Right: D, Right Arrow

Left: A, Left Arrow

How does this fit along with the topic:

This fits with the topic Limited Space because there is only a limited amount of space in the sewer before it fills up the entire sewer

Credits:

Art:

 based off of https://thkaspar.itch.io/micro-character-bases 

and based of of this 
https://www.reddit.com/r/PixelArt/comments/eaqghu/sickening_sewage_pixel_dailies...
